Text: Zaphod703, bravo! This is an outstanding collection, and extremely well-organized. If you picked all these out, then you have exceptional taste! Well done.
Great torrent. Thank you for the work compiling this.

painstakingly yes lol i put it all together.  Took alot from my collection...
read articles from http://girlsreadcomics.com/
http://ifanboy.com/articles/gateway-comics-for-girls-who-dont-read-comics/
http://the-artifice.com/4-all-ages-comics-that-really-are-for-all-ages/
... and more articles
.... read bunch of reviews of stuff..... and bam this is what i got!  glad you all like it!
o yeah few comics like Agents of Atlas & Immortal Iron Fist don't really perfectly fit with this idea... but them being some of my favorites so I had to throw them in! lol

Probably should give out thanks to all the scanners!
PLUS uploader darkhomr for his/hers Zero Day Comics Week packs that have introduced me to many great comics!
And Lastly.... bulk rename utility program... my comic collection would be nothing without it!
